scripts.start-blockchain: cd quorum && docker-compose up -d && cd ../blockchain-explorer && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose-quorum.yml up -d && cd ../ethAdapter/EthAdapter && docker-compose up -d && sleep 20s && curl -I http://172.16.16.16:3000/check
scripts.stop-blockchain: cd ethadapter/EthAdapter && docker-compose stop && cd ../../blockchain-explorer && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml stop && cd ../quorum && docker-compose stop
scripts.down-blockchain: cd ethadapter/EthAdapter && docker-compose down && cd ../../blockchain-explorer && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml down && cd ../quorum && docker-compose down
